actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 97-387.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 548.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

actions.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended).
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Energy and Commerce.  Report No: 97-893.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 558.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Passed House (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 97-345.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: An act to exempt the Lake Oswego, Oregon, hydroelectric facility from part I of the Federal Power Act (Act of June 10, 1920) as amended,  and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Exempts the Lake Oswego, Oregon, hydroelectric facility and Lake Oswego from specified provisions of the Federal Power Act and the Energy Security Act in order to remove them from the jurisdiction of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission until otherwise provided by Congress. States that nothing in this Act shall be construed to affect the applicability of the Fish and Wildlife Coordination Act to such facility or to such lake.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1976 with respect to Lake Oswego, and for other purposes.
An act to exempt the Lake Oswego, Oregon, hydroelectric facility from part I of the Federal Power Act (Act of June 10, 1920) as amended,  and for other purposes.
